Class ControllerFrame

java.lang.Object
application.ControllerFrame
public class ControllerFrame extends Object
Author:
Enguerran De Larocque Latour Ilyas Tibari Oumaima Zahiri Clement Bourlet Maxime Boichon This class is the controller of the interface handling the image by image mode.

    • receiveDataFromScene

      public void receiveDataFromScene​(String pathe, String pathMarkede, String pathResume, String chosenpathe, javafx.util.Duration videoTime, ArrayList<int[]> Event) throws IOException
      This method receives the data from the other controller
      Parameters:
      pathe - path of the video
      pathMarkede - path of the marked video
      pathResume - path of the resume video
      chosenpathe - path of the video to display
      videoTime - time of the video
      Event - list of the events found in the video
      Throws:
      IOException

      public static org.opencv.core.Mat selectFrame​(org.opencv.videoio.VideoCapture cap, int ind)
